001package ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port;
002
003import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.net.RawFrame;
004import java.util.Optional;
005
006/**
007 * Port that provides captured raw frames from a network interface or trace.
008 * <p>Implementations typically wrap libpcap or replay files. Not inherently thread-safe.</p>
009 *
010 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
011 */
012public interface PacketSource extends AutoCloseable {
013  /**
014   * Starts capture or prepares the underlying source.
015   *
016   * @throws Exception if the source cannot be opened
017   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
018   */
019  void start() throws Exception;
020
021  /**
022   * Retrieves the next frame when available.
023   *
024   * @return optional frame; empty when no data is currently available or the source is exhausted
025   * @throws Exception if capture fails
026   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
027   */
028  Optional<RawFrame> poll() throws Exception;
029
030  /**
031   * Indicates whether the source has been fully drained and will not deliver more frames.
032   *
033   * @return {@code true} when the source is exhausted and capture can shut down
034   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
035   */
036  default boolean isExhausted() {
037    return false;
038  }
039
040  /**
041   * Closes the underlying capture resources.
042   *
043   * @throws Exception if shutdown fails
044   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
045   */
046  @Override
047  void close() throws Exception;
048}
